title: raccoin
author: raccoin
created_time: March 12, 2023, 03:07:30 PMLast edit: May 04, 2023, 10:49:17 AM by raccoin
content: RACCOIN.CORACCOIN.COWe are glad to present you an update of cryptocurrency mixing directions:- ETH- BTCAs well as continuing to work with USDT.We work with our own cryptocurrency reserve , so the user's cryptocurrency is not mixed with the cryptocurrency of other users, this applies to any of the directions of "mixing". Due to this we provide increased security for our clients, because you get completely clean cryptocurrency to your wallet without any traces.ðŸª™Minimum amount of exchange is $100 ðŸ“‰Discount on exchange from $1000 - Big pool of own funds for exchange ðŸ’°- Fast exchange ðŸ’µ- TOR-mirror ðŸŒ- Referral program ðŸ“£- 24/7 support ðŸ’¬USDT/BTC/ETH applications - processed automatically. Support : https://t.me/raccoin_mixerOr contact the support team on our website.

comments.author: AB de Royse777
comments.body: I am trying to understand, is it for TRC20 USDT only?Right now you need only one thing to take note: You need to have an image which is large enough to fit the screen. Now it's too small.Welcome to the forum. The site looks very nice and clean. Good job there. Hopefully it's fully functional. You are in the oldest and largest Crypto community. With proper promotion plan, it's possible to create a good name for the product. If you want then I can assist you with my years of experience.Cheers,

comments.author: Kauyaz
comments.body: Hey. The link is wrong:http://HTTPS://RACCOIN.COyou should modify it

comments.author: NeuroticFish
comments.body: I agree with Royse777: while the image (and website) show images of Bitcoin, Litecoin and Ethereum, the lower part seems to allow only TRC20 USDT. A bit misleading and prone to errors.I'll add that imho the image you posted is not a good enough advertising, you could use a bit more text or make it larger/more visible.And since I see that you seem to use cloudflare and captcha too, I'll warn you that most people who want to mix coins may not be happy about that (because it hurts their privacy).Plus, yes, the link needs to be fixed too; OP, you can edit that post of yours and fix it.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: This must be a joke, or maybe I am not thinking right.Mixing a centralized coin like USDT TRC20? Really? A token that can be frozen or blocked anytime in even a noncustodial wallet?So what happens when I mix using your service, and then I end up getting stolen USDT from a hacker who was also trying to mix the coins, and then they end up getting frozen in my address even before I use them?There is a reason we have mostly Bitcoin mixing services and not those of the centralized coins.

comments.author: raccoin
comments.body: Pretty simple here.The client sends his/her tokens, we share "clean" tokens from our large investor's reserves.No actual mixing -> No trails -> Better anonymity.

comments.author: raccoin
comments.body: Service updates: Chatbot added  TOR-link: http://m2u3wh2lft6223b5jkzh7oprq72t45wgbgdwgd7bqqyvjzifbkskhjyd.onion Russian language added

comments.author: raccoin
comments.body: Don't forget TG account for technical support @raccoin_mixer

comments.author: suzanne5223
comments.body: Hello and welcome to the forum.Your Ann's design is excellent.Is this innovative and you're the first cryptocurrency tumbler site I know that provides mixing service for USDT. I saw on your site that you're planning to add a mixing service for ETH which is exactly what I am looking for in the tumbler site. When exactly will it happen?In the meantime, I hope you intend to do some marketing on this forum so you can be among the industry-leading mixing site as well. In that area, I can help you with Bitcointalk marketing with the right tactics. Hope you enjoy your stay here.

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: Welcome to the forum there have been a lot of mixers lately after the biggest competitors were seized by the authorities. But I have never thought that USDT can be mixed. Well, maybe the idea starts with the tornado cash that happens to be available for ETH transactions.@OP, if it's getting the attention of everybody. I think you need to add all of those details on your first post so that it can be quickly seen.

We are working on integrating this functionality into our website, for now you can work with these cryptocurrencies only in manual mode by writing to our manager or support team.

comments.author: raccoin
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin_Arena on March 12, 2023, 11:17:54 PMThis must be a joke, or maybe I am not thinking right.Mixing a centralized coin like USDT TRC20? Really? A token that can be frozen or blocked anytime in even a noncustodial wallet?So what happens when I mix using your service, and then I end up getting stolen USDT from a hacker who was also trying to mix the coins, and then they end up getting frozen in my address even before I use them?There is a reason we have mostly Bitcoin mixing services and not those of the centralized coins.Maybe you misunderstood, we do not mix USDT, and take the client's USDT and give a completely clean unmarked funds. We have a large pool of our own funds with which we make this method work. By the way, we also added BTC and ETH for mixing, but for now it works in manual mode, soon we will add this functionality to the site, but for now you can use it through our manager or support service on the site.

comments.author: suzanne5223
comments.body: Quote from: raccoin on April 17, 2023, 07:24:56 PMQuote from: suzanne5223 on March 27, 2023, 08:59:54 PMHello and welcome to the forum.Your Ann's design is excellent.Is this innovative and you're the first cryptocurrency tumbler site I know that provides mixing service for USDT. I saw on your site that you're planning to add a mixing service for ETH which is exactly what I am looking for in the tumbler site. When exactly will it happen?In the meantime, I hope you intend to do some marketing on this forum so you can be among the industry-leading mixing site as well. In that area, I can help you with Bitcointalk marketing with the right tactics. Hope you enjoy your stay here.Hi ! It already happened, we added ETH and BTC for your convenience, but for now you can use it by writing to our manager or our support service. Soon the functionality will be available on the site !That's nice but it would have been better if the mixing of ETH and BTC can make it public instead of contacting your manager or support before people can make use of the service. I am saying this because most cryptocurrency users don't have time for something that prolongs their use of privacy instead of making it easy. It is good that you have disabled CloudFlare.

Thanks for noticing what I've said and you've given some updates and answers that sufficed my curiosity about your service. And just as the other mixing services that I've seen, you're also providing some service to those who want to start their own mixing service, is that right or it's just the pool of funds that you have? Anyway, keep us updated.

comments.author: suzanne5223
comments.body: Quote from: raccoin on April 26, 2023, 01:47:05 PMNot quite sure what you are talking about at the end, but we have plans and ideas that we will write about here !)A letter of guarantee is something introduced by the crypto mixer to protect their user's/customer's interest in case things go south and it always gives privacy more confidence about the mixing site services.It always contains a digitally signed confirmation to verify that the deposit wallet addresses a customer used provided an address that was generated by our mixing server.
